text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Kharaca karo bhalo bisayabastu ya tomara uparjana kara, ara ya amara tomadera jan'ya mati theke utpadana kare thaki ta theke, ara ya nikrsta ta theke kharaca karate sankalpa karo na yakhana tomara nijera tara grahanakari ha'o na, era prati upeksa kara chara. Ara jene rekho, nihsandeha allah sbayansamrd'dha, parama prasansita.
